member.summary: Returns the servo group in the given with the given , or null if none exists. If multiple servo groups have the same name, only one of them is returned.
member.param: Name of servo group to find.

member.name: M:KRPC.InfernalRobotics.InfernalRobotics.ServoWithName(KRPC.SpaceCenter.Services.Vessel,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the servo in the given with the given or null if none exists. If multiple servos have the same name, only one of them is returned.
member.param: Name of the servo to find.
